concept.title: Meeting server configuration files
concept.shortdesc: There are a number of configuration files on the Sametime Meeting server that a backup copy should be retained after the server configuration is complete.

conbody.p: Meeting servers are deployed on Docker or Kubernetes. The following tables describes the configuration files associated with each of these platforms.

row.entry:
Contains environment variables:
Guest access
STUN server configuration
SIP configuration settings for Dial out
Single Sign On
Meeting Server Timezone

ul.li: Information about the Sametime Proxy server
Number of days meeting recordings remain on server
Fully qualified hostname of the Meeting server

row.entry:
Contains environment variables:
Guest access
STUN server configuration
SIP configuration settings for dial out
Single Sign On
Meeting server timezone

Passes values into the Release helm chart
Recording settings
STUN server configuration
SIP configuration settings for dial out
